Nov. 20, 2010 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
Les Preludes [arr. Gay]
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Best instrumentalist - soprano BTM Best Trombone Section: BTM Best Bass Section: BTM. Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd £250, 3rd £150. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 25, 2010, 8:27 a.m. July 1, 2020, 4:11 p.m.
